name: Referral Bot
description: A discord bot that allows you to track how many people each member has brought in to the server. It only works on individual servers (unless there's a lot of overlap between servers and even then why would you) so it needs to be hosted individually.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token generated by the discord developer portal that links this code to the usable discord bot profile.

DEBUG_LOG.description: The channel to log debug messages to (currently not working, provide a channel anyway because it breaks otherwise).

INFO_LOG.description: Same as debug log but for more verbose messages. Also not working, but also breaks if not provided, so please put a channel here.
